entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Temperature rising to 17 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: A few showers ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening then light before morning. Temperature rising to 17 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 6:40 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
